alert.note: Alert for Holmes (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 6:30PM EDT until July 30 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 530 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Geneva to 7 miles west of Graceville, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Geneva, Esto, Noma, Black, Tendil Crossing, Arrant Settlement, Holland Crossroads, Smith Crossroads, Izagora, New Hope, Noma Junction, Somerset, Miller Crossroads, Leonia, Holmes County Airport, Barker Store, Bethlehem, Prosperity, Sweetgum Head and Royals Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
